name: The Fairy King's Adventure
description: The Fairy King's Adventure is a single player 3D game. It's character is the fairy king named Charles which have a tiny wings. He need to grow his wings larger in order for him to be verified as a king. He need to drink the required potion to grow his wings. The game's goal is to get the potion, but before you can reach the destination of the potion you must survive all the obstacles in each level. There are boxes anywhere in the map. Each box have it's own color. Each color have it's corresponding role, like the red box - it can drain 20% of your life etc. Collect all the required keys to unlock next level and get the potion.
